name: Sunflora
flavorText:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.

previous.name: Sunkern
previous.flavorText:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

next.name: Yanma
next.flavorText:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.
